name: School Heist (Boss Studios)
description:
- - - Incoming message from your friend - - -

This is it. Are you sure you want to do this? Well, never mind, it's too late now and since you arrived, there is no backing out. That was the deal. Now, I don't know where the microcontrollers are exactly, but I'm sure they are somewhere within the school rooms. My sources say there should be around 20 of them. If I were you I would check every room, drawer, cupboard I could access. If you can't enter a certain room, don't bother it's not worth GETTING CAUGHT!

-Yeah that's right, my sources say Mr.K will be patrolling the halls, so beware of him. I don't know what he's doing in school this late at night but
at this time of the hour he isn't...    ...himself.

If you think he has found you try to hide somewhere where he can't reach you.

Just get all the microcontrollers and get out!
